Chinese.Description: 添加新的温度机制并替代原版的低温机制，每个生物有独立的温度条，当高温达到一定的阈值时会触发燃烧。当低温达到一定阈值时会触发短暂冰冻。部分伤害具有高温属性。

English.Description: Add a new temperature mechanic to replace original hypothermia. Each creature has a separate temperature bar. Burning will be triggered when the high temperature reaches a certain threshold.A short freeze will be triggered the low temperature reaches a certain threshold. Some kind of damage has a high temperature property.
